programme.desc: Russell, um operrio da fbrica, tenta proteger seu irmo mais novo, Rodney, de todos os perigos. No entanto, quando este desaparece, Russell decide resolver o problema por conta prpria.

programme.desc: Este filme sangrento segue dois casais jovens em uma jornada para encontrar a verdade sobre um personagem mtico conhecido apenas como Dr. Satans.

programme.title: Naruto e a equipe finalmente descansam. J se passaram quatro dias desde o incio da prova, restando apenas um para o fim. Naruto sugere duplicar o pergaminho do cu, que ainda precisam ter, e tenta abrir o pergaminho da terra, supostamente selado.

programme.sub-title: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro?

programme.sub-title: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: We Picked Up Something Crazy!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1
programme.desc: Koichi and Hazamada visit the home of Rohan Kishibe, a popular manga artist whom they are huge fans of. Much to their joy, Rohan not only agrees to sign autographs but also invites them to take a tour of his workspace.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2
programme.desc: Koichi is drawn back to Rohans house, where he sees the manga artist finishing up his next manga at an incredible speed. Rohan uses his stand Heavens Door on Koichi again to gain further creative inspiration from the young boys life experience.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go Hunting!
programme.desc: Jotaro and Josuke must hunt down a rat that is believed to have become a Stand user after being shot by the bow and arrow. When the two arrive at the site, they find dozens of dead rats killed in the most bizarre fashion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle and Shoot are lying in wait for Cheetu. But just as Cheetu is about to approach them, he suddenly changes direction and disappears. Meanwhile, Killua and Gon sense that someone is following them again.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The assassin Ikalgo, an octopus-type Chimera Ant, attacks Killua with his Nen Abilities. Killua captures him and tells Ikalgo that he'll let him live if he divulges his ally's abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon tries to bond with a Chimera Ant called Meleoron, even though it's risky for a Nen user to reveal his abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is killing time as he awaits the selection. He calls upon masters of shogi and go and defeats every one of them.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov is making his way to the palace. The Chimera Ants Leol and Flutter follow him to try to determine his abilities, but they lose sight of him.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is annoyed and confounded after meeting Komugi, the unfathomable Gungi world champion. But at the same time, he is having fun.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov infiltrates the palace. His goal is to place the exits for his ability, the Fourth Dimensional Mansion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Morel has been chased into an underground church by the lion-type Chimera Ant, Leol.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua have gained new allies and prepare to charge into battle.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: With only one more day remaining until the selection, Gon, Killua and Ikalgo go over their strategy.
programme.sub-title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.title: Death Note: Confession
programme.desc: Light goes to Aoyama to discover the identity of the second Kira before L becomes more suspicious.

programme.title: Death Note: Friend
programme.desc: Light and Misa show each other their Death Notes, and Light asks Misa to have her shinigami Rem get rid of L.

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Inside a shadowy St. Moritz hotel, danger leaves Joseph and Lisa Lisa no time to mourn as they follow a bloody trail to Wamuu and Kars. Luckily, Lisa Lisa manages to strike a dealbut, of course, with one condition.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Joseph and Wamuu finally face off in an equestrian one-on-one. But will Josephs adroit attacks and weapon-grasping prowess be enough to keep Wamuus millennia-old pride in check?

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Warrior of Wind
programme.desc: When the battle between Wamuu and Joseph comes to a head, the surprising confessions arent far behind. Now the final hour has come for Lisa Lisa and Karsa fighter very different from his fellow Pillar Men.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Ties that Bind JoJo
programme.desc: With Lisa Lisas life on the line, Joseph must deceive the deceiver. Joining Joseph, Stroheim and Speedwagon arrive at the battlefield, where a family tragedy threatens to doom the world to a hopeless future.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Birth of a Superbeing
programme.desc: Having seized the Red Stone and the mask, Kars has become the Ultimate Being. Now the seemingly invincible entity has his sights solely on Joseph who, fleeing, has one final trick up his sleeve.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Ascendant One
programme.desc: Deep within a volcanos molten lava, Kars contemplates a comeback. But with the Red Stones power unleashed, both warriors are launched into the stratosphere of the unknown.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit
programme.desc: Japan, 1987. Jotaro Kujo, a descendant of the Joestar family, is in prison and claims he is being possessed by an evil spirit. His grandfather, Joseph Joestar, immediately departs for Japan, where he must reveal the family's terrible secret.
programme.sub-title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Who Will Be the Judge!?
programme.desc: Jotaro returns to his normal life while keeping his "Stand" power a secret. But on the way to school one day he meets a new transfer student named Noriaki Kakyoin and sustains a strange injury.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Curse of DIO
programme.desc: Jotaro defeats Kakyoin with his Stand power, but as he attempts to glean information from his adversary about DIO, Joseph notices a sinister connection.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Tower of Grey
programme.desc: The Joestars must defeat DIO within 50 days or Holly's life is forfeit. With no time to lose, they head for Egypt where DIO is thought to be hiding but end up encountering a new threat along the way.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon decides to go to Kukuroo Mountain to bring Killua back.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Drama)

programme.title: Death at a Funeral, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Death at a Funeral is a hilarious day in the life of an American family come together to put a beloved husband and father to rest.

programme.title: I Got The Hook Up, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two small time scam artists, Black and Blue, sell boom boxes and broken TVs from their van at the parking lot. When, by mistake, a shipment of cellular phones gets to them, it doesn't take long before FBI and gangsters are after them.

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kevin is a thief who breaks into Max Fairbanks' unoccupied mansion. Kevin finds himself face to face with Max. And just as the cops arrest Kevin, Max claims Kevin's ring as his own.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually-poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start, all bets are off!

programme.title: I Got The Hook Up, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two small time scam artists, Black and Blue, sell boom boxes and broken TVs from their van at the parking lot. When, by mistake, a shipment of cellular phones gets to them, it doesn't take long before FBI and gangsters are after them.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Fear of a Black Hat, (1994, Documentary)

programme.desc: A martial arts book, which Hsu Yin-Fung (Jackie Chan) carries, is being highly sought by various clans and gangs, but he is in pursuit of someone himself.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral, (2010, Comedy)

programme.title: Bloodsport, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Frank Dux journeys to Hong Kong to enter the Kumite, the Olympics of martial arts, and meets a beautiful American reporter. Before long he must face Chong-Li, a vicious Korean master of Tae Kwan Do, in a climactic fight to the finish.

programme.title: The Octagon, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris is back in this action-packed martial arts showcase co-starring the legendary Lee Van Cleef. Norris takes on his adoptive brother and a training camp where terrorists are being taught the secret killing techniques of the ninja!

programme.title: American Ninja, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong, a one-man fighting machine. Serving in the army to avoid prison, Joe finds himself battling the deadly Black Star Order, as well as corrupt military leaders in order to bring down an illegal arms sale.

programme.title: Dressed to Kill, (1980, Thriller)
programme.desc: A psycho-killer stalks two New York City women--one a frustrated housewife, the other a street-smart hooker who teams up with the first woman's son to trap the murderer. The film reaches a shocking climax when the slayer's real identity is revealed.

programme.title: Blow Out, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Philadelphia sound-effects man witnesses and records a car accident that turns out to be a politically motivated murder.

programme.title: F/X, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: Rollie Tyler, a movie special-effects man, accepts $30,000 from the Justice Department's Witness Relocation Program to stage the fake assassination of a mob figure who has agreed to name names.

programme.title: To Live And Die In L.A., (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Federal agent Richard Chance has a score to settle, and he's through playing by the rules. He vows to take down a murderous counterfeiter by any means necessary. But as the stakes grow higher, will Chance's obsession ultimately destroy him?

programme.title: The Honeymooners, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bus driver Ralph Kramden and sanitation engineer Ed Norton are best friends who dream of making it big. Their most recent get-rich-quick plan finds the boys out to make their fortune by hiring a dog trainer to race their pet greyhound.

programme.title: The Prince and Me, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A fairy tale love-story about a pre-med student who falls in love with a Danish Prince who refused to follow the traditions of his parents and has come to the US to rebel.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: Sara is a small-town girl who dreams to become a world-class ballerina. But when her mother suddenly dies, she must abandon her plans and join her estranged father on Chicago's South Side.

programme.title: Shall We Dance?, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mind-numbing existence. One night, his whole life changes after the sight of a beautiful dance instructor inspire him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: What If, (2014, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Wallace, who is burned out from a string of failed relationships, forms an instant bond with Chantry, who lives with her longtime boyfriend. Together, they puzzle out what it means if your best friend is also the love of your life.

programme.title: The Honeymooners, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bus driver Ralph Kramden and sanitation engineer Ed Norton are best friends who dream of making it big. Their most recent get-rich-quick plan finds the boys out to make their fortune by hiring a dog trainer to race their pet greyhound.

programme.title: Salmon Fishing In The Yemen, (2012, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

programme.title: After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.

programme.title: Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and its revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idates older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.

programme.title: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobos Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.

programme.title: After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja dont bother to lay traps along the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Nejis blind spot.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is determined to stop Tayuya, but she uses her Summoning Jutsu to call forth three giants. Meanwhile, on the plains, the battle between Kimimaro and Naruto is about to begin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Ukon, who is able to infiltrate the bodies of others, enters Kibas body and tries to merge with his cells.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya with his Shadow Possession Jutsu. But Tayuya moves to her Second State and fights back with enormous strength.

programme.title: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.

programme.title: Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaaras wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack.

programme.title: Kimimaro succeeds in shattering Gaaras protective sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto tries desperately to change Sasukes mind, but Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Kill The Irishman, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: Original Gangstas, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A fast-paced Action-Thriller about adults living in a crime-ridden area. They are tired of being bullied, and take matters into their own hands to rid the town of the criminals.

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: Charade, (1963, Thriller)
programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

programme.title: Paris When It Sizzles, (1964, Romance)
programme.desc: Richard Quine directs George Axelrod's acerbic script (adapted from Julien Duvivier's La Fte Henriette) in this romantic comedy that reunites William Holden and Audrey Hepburn for the first time since 1954's Sabrina.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood returns as the Man With No Name, who teams up with equally lethal Colonel Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef) in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic from legendary director Sergio Leone.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible 'Man With No Name' in lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money alongside Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach in this renowned, influential, and classic cinematic western directed by the great Sergio Leone.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: Barefoot In The Park, (1967, Romance)
programme.desc: Robert Redford is Mister Straight. Jane Fonda is his new wife. As the ecstasy of the honeymoon gives way to the reality of setting up housekeeping in a five-flight walk-up, the harmony of marriage turns to comical discord.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Forces of Nature, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Ben is trying to get to Savannah for his wedding. A seagull flies into the engine as his plane is taking off. All later flights are canceled because of an approaching hurricane, so he hitches a ride in with an attractive woman named Sara.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Paul Newman earned an Oscar nomination plus Best Actor honors from the National Society of Film Critics and New York Film Critics Circle for his portrayal of Sully, a likeable working stiff whos made a lifetime of bad decisions.

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A group of Chicago real-estate salesmen and con artists live on the edge.

programme.title: Higher Learning, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Kristy Swanson, Omar Epps and Michael Rapaport star as first-term freshmen who get a crash course in diversity, identity and sexuality in writer/director John Singleton's bold look at contemporary college life.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage garnered a Best Actor Oscar for his hauntingly disturbing portrayal of a suicidal alcoholic who falls for a compassionate Las Vegas prostitute (Elisabeth Shue) in one of the year's most critically acclaimed films.

programme.title: A Month By The Lake, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: An attractive older guest at the Lake Como Resort has her eye on a handsome, well-to-do bachelor, and will go to outrageous lengths to reel in her wealthy catch.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Paul Newman earned an Oscar nomination plus Best Actor honors from the National Society of Film Critics and New York Film Critics Circle for his portrayal of Sully, a likeable working stiff whos made a lifetime of bad decisions.

programme.title: Big Night, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: In a restaurant run by two Italian immigrants, the tables sit empty despite the extraordinary talents of Primo the chef (Tony Shalhoub, Monk) and the ambitious efforts of his brother Secondo (Stanley Tucci).

programme.title: Capricorn One, (1977, Thriller)
programme.desc: A NASA Mars mission won't work, and its funding is endangered, so they decide to fake it just this once. But then they have to keep the secret.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers, (1978, Science fiction)
programme.desc: This dazzling remake of the 1956 spine-tingler stars Donald Sutherland, Brooke Adams, Jeff Goldblum, Leonard Nimoy and Veronica Cartwright in an eerie tale of possession by "alien pods."

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror, (1979, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Supposed true story about the Lutzm family whose dream house turns into a nightmare. The unsuspecting new tenants of a house whose previous occupants had been murdered in their sleep.

programme.title: A Boy And His Dog, (1975, Science fiction)
programme.desc: World War IV has ravaged Earth, and its survivors must battle for food, shelter and companionship in a post-atomic wasteland.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action- packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 2: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's blimp is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen - five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba's past who are out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Ta squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law, but a reunion with his mixed up crew and the loss of his extra legs quickly dampens the captain's enthusiasm!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Meeting Again After Two Years! Luffy and Law!

programme.title: While Captain Smoker determines his next move, a very large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard's mysterious transformation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst in the World! A Scientist of Terror - Caesar!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Toriko, Luffy, and Goku's three-way tie in the World's Best Eating Competition, the festivities are interrupted by the sudden appearance of a monster that threatens to consume every living thing on earth.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Historys Strongest Collaboration vs. Glutton of the Sea

programme.title: The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopper's Fury! The Master's Inhumane Experiment!

programme.title: The story of how Trafalgar Law arrived at Punk Hazard is revealed, and the Yeti Cool Brothers set their sights on a showdown with the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Annihilate the Straw Hats! Legendary Assassins Descend!

programme.title: Luffy tries to chase down the Yetti Cool Brothers, but Franky still trapped in Chopper's Body makes his mission extremely difficult. Just when all appears lost, an unexpected ally lends a hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Nami! Luffy's Fight on the Snow-Capped Mountains!

programme.title: Luffy agrees to an alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master unleashes something very deadly!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Formed! Luffy and Law's Pirate Alliance!

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook continue their search for the samurai, Trafalgar tries to sneak Chopper into the laboratory, and Luffy boldly challenges the Master!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capture M! The Pirate Alliance's Operation Launches!

programme.title: Luffy's battle with his old nemesis Smoker is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying toxic blob and the evil genius who created the monster!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: On the Verge of Annihilation! A Deadly Monster Comes Flying In!

programme.title: The Straw Hats make a valiant push to capture Caesar Clown - Luffy matches his Armament Haki with Clown's powerful Gas-Gas Fruit powers! The battle turns in favor of the Straw Hats, but underestimating Clown's abilities may have deadly consequences!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Intense Battle! Caesar Exercises His True Power!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law finds trouble in the form of an old acquaintance, Chopper investigates the Master's lab, and the mysterious Samurai shows what he can do with a full body!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)

programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela. Gneros: Crime Elenco: Demi Moore, Joss Ackland, Lambert Wilson, Michael Caine Diretor: Michael Radford

Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jean-Claude Van Damme, David Castaeda, Elijah Rodriguez, Nicholas Sean Johnny, Charlie MacGechan, Joana Metrass, Dean John-Wilson, Jim Caesar, Kerry Bennett, Uriel Emil Pollack Diretor: Lior Geller
